meanings.definition: The act or practice of making an excessive profit, especially illegally or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: Profiteering is when someone makes too much money by cheating others.
meanings.sent2: The government cracked down on profiteering during the crisis.
meanings.sent3: The storybook villain was caught profiteering by selling fake magic beans.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, profiteering can be like a dark shadow looming over honest transactions.
meanings.sent5: The news article exposed the shocking reality of profiteering in the pharmaceutical industry.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in profiteering.
meanings.sent1: The profiteering individual was known for taking advantage of others for personal gain.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a profiteering opportunist for exploiting the situation.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed the antagonist as a cunning profiteering character.
meanings.sent4: The profiteering figure in the story symbolized greed and deceit.
meanings.sent5: The courtroom drama revealed the true identity of the profiteering swindler.
